name: Aident AI
description: AI development assistant tool ranked #5 Product of the Day on Product Hunt.

name: GPT-5.2-Codex
description: Advanced agentic coding model optimized for complex software engineering with context compaction, stronger performance on large code changes, improved Windows environments, and enhanced cybersecurity capabilities for defensive security work.
community_quotes: Most advanced agentic coding model yet for complex real-world software engineering
State-of-the-art performance on SWE-Bench Pro and Terminal-Bench 2.0
Better at long-context understanding and reliable tool calling
Stronger cybersecurity capabilities than any previous OpenAI model

name: Letta Code
description: Memory-first coding agent that persists across sessions and improves with use, featuring long-lived agents that learn from experience through agentic context engineering, long-term memory, and skill learning. Ranked #1 model-agnostic open source agent on Terminal-Bench.
community_quotes: The #1 model-agnostic OSS harness on Terminal-Bench
Agents that learn over time rather than working in independent sessions
Continual learning through memory initialization and skill learning

name: Cursor Visual Editor
description: Visual AI agent tool integrated into Cursor's AI coding platform that enables designers to build web applications through natural language prompts and drag-and-drop controls, expanding Cursor beyond pure coding into visual design workflows.
community_quotes: Professional design tools integrated into AI coding platform
AI agent-driven tool for web application design
Challenges Adobe and Figma with AI-powered visual editing

name: AutonomyAI
description: Tool that unifies Design, Product & Development into a single AI-native workflow for streamlined development processes.
community_quotes: Unifies Design, Product & Dev into single AI Native workflow
Ranked #5 Product of the Day on December 11, 2025

name: Mistral Devstral 2
description: Open-source agentic coding models and CLI agent from Mistral AI, launched on Product Hunt.
community_quotes: Open-source agentic coding models and CLI agent

name: Morph
description: AI coding tool using subagents for better code generation and fast editing, capable of applying AI-generated edits at 10,500+ tokens per second to improve coding agent performance.
community_quotes: Fast apply models and AI code editing
